title: Want to stay up to date on episodes?
subtitle: Here’s how you can stay in the loop on the latest Spirits & Lyrics episodes:

cards.title: Listen on our website
cards.subtitle: Click on the play button next to any of episodes listed on the website.

cards.title: Download on Demand
cards.subtitle: Get each episode as soon as it’s released via a Podcast app.

title: Still having trouble figuring out how to listen?
subtitle: Not to worry, there are two other options for you:

cards.title: Smart Download
cards.subtitle: If you’re on a mobile device, we’ll determine which app is best based on your device.

cards.title: How To Download A Podcast
cards.subtitle: The people over at the Serial podcast put together a very simple video on how download and listen to a podcast.
